infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We use the camera to allow you to take and upload photos, for example when adding images to a form or uploading documents for a clinic.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We use photo library access to allow you to select and upload existing photos, for example choosing images from your device to attach to a form or share with a clinic.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Your location is used to show nearby One Dental World clinics and available appointment slots in your area, such as displaying ODW clinics closest to your current location.

plugins.cameraPermission: We use the camera to allow you to take and upload photos, for example when adding images to a form or uploading documents for a clinic.
plugins.photosPermission: We use photo library access to allow you to select and upload existing photos, for example choosing images from your device to attach to a form or share with a clinic.

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Your location is used to show nearby One Dental World clinics and available appointment slots in your area, such as displaying ODW clinics closest to your current location.
